thread.title: A very good hotel in a fantastic location
thread.title_full: A very good hotel in a fantastic location - Review of The Nadler Soho, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: MyPrivateWorld
title: A very good hotel in a fantastic location
text:
I spent 6 days in London just to eat (from Sunday to Saturday).
Although small the room was perfect to my needs. Well decorated and confortable.
The service was tremendously friendly. Special notes to Alberto, Jessica and Liliana. Made me feel at home. Thank to all of you!
For those wanting to stay in the heart of Soho, Nadler Soho is the appropriate choice.
